decision.summary: The proposal to deploy Aave v3 on Plasma is well-supported by the community, with detailed risk parameters and incentives outlined. Voting results show near unanimous support, indicating strong community backing. The proposal aims to leverage Plasma's high-performance blockchain for Aave's protocol expansion and includes collaboration plans with the Plasma Foundation.
key_arguments_for: Plasma offers zero fees, fast transactions, and strong security suitable for stablecoins.
Detailed risk parameters have been provided and updated.
The Plasma Foundation will supply 10M USDT and support Aave incentives exclusively.
Collaboration opportunities with Plasma for GHO stablecoin adoption and liquidity expansion.
Community voting results show overwhelming support with 888,349 votes for YAE and negligible opposition.

evidence.quote: This ARFC proposes the deployment of an Aave V3 Instance on Plasma... The Plasma Foundation will supply 10M USDT and ensure Aave is the only lending protocol receiving incentive distributions.

risks: Dependence on Plasma network performance and security over time.
Potential changes in risk parameters during the ARFC stage may affect deployment safety.
Operational risks related to integration and incentive management by ACI and Plasma Foundation.
follow_up_actions: Monitor the ARFC stage for feedback and updates on risk parameters.
Track the final AIP vote for confirmation and enforcement.
Observe the performance and adoption metrics of Aave v3 on Plasma post-deployment.
